name: HAWKEN - Prosk Starter Bundle
detailed_description:
Prosk Industries is one of the three Multi Planetary Corporations (MPCs) battling it out over the ruined colonies of Illal. The Prosk Starter Bundle comes with a classic mech from each class (the Infiltrator, the Sharpshooter, the Vanguard) and an exclusive Prosk Industries emblem to display with pride on your in-game profile. By purchasing this bundle, you're getting a nice discount over purchasing each mech individually!

Bundle Includes


Bundle Details

Exclusive Item
  • Prosk Pilot Emblem

Mechs
  • Infiltrator
    The Infiltrator is the master of the hit-and-run tactic. With powerful, chargeable weapons and advanced cloaking technology, this mech can easily surprise enemies from any direction.
    http://www.playhawken.com/game-guide/mechs/light-mechs/infiltrator

  • Sharpshooter
    The Sharpshooter is the master of long-range warfare. Its Sabot Rifle is precise and powerful, and can be granted extra damage with the Power Shot special ability.
    http://www.playhawken.com/game-guide/mechs/medium-mechs/sharpshooter

  • Brawler
    The Brawler is built for close-range combat and taking plenty of punishment. The Fortified Turret special ability generates a steady amount of healing to increase this mech's effectiveness on the front lines.
    http://www.playhawken.com/game-guide/mechs/heavy-mechs/brawler

short_description: Prosk Industries is one of the three Multi Planetary Corporations (MPCs) battling it out over the ruined colonies of Illal. The Prosk Starter Bundle comes with a classic mech from each class (the Infiltrator, the Sharpshooter, the Vanguard) and an exclusive Prosk Industries emblem to display with pride on your in-game profile.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish, Japanese, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7/8/10 (32bit or 64bit)
  • Processor: 2Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB Graphics Card Supporting DirectX 9.0c and Shader Model 3.0 (NVIDIA 9800 GTX or AMD HD 5670)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280 x 720 or Higher Resolution
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7/8/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: 3Ghz Quad Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024MB Graphics Card Supporting DirectX 9.0c and Shader Model 3.0 (NVIDIA GTX 460 or AMD HD 6850)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280 x 720 or Higher Resolution
